tweet: @alighalaita @UnionCoop السلام عليكم. في الوقت الحالي رقم العضوية غير متاح لطلبات التوصيل، بس شغالين عالموضوع و إنشاءالله من الشهر القادم نعلن عنه عند اكتمال الإجراءات
@minaliccione Thank you. I apologise for the inconvenince and we're reforming our order processing so things like never happen again for you or any other customer.

@minaliccione items on promotions go out of stock fast and the app get's updated based on feedback from the stores that may be a bit delayed when the store is really busy. We've dispatched a grocer to get those items from a nearby store that has the items and we're sending them out to you ASAP
